name: PactMaker
description: Starter workflow for creating self-signed PDF agreements with node.js and express

FROM_ADDRESS.description: The email address to send your emails From in Postmark.

POSTMARK_SERVER_TOKEN.description: Server tokens can be found on the credentials tab on your Postmark server.

INTERNAL_EMAIL_RECIPIENTS.description: Comma separated list of email address to send PDF agreement.

TITLE.description: Name of your company or app. This will appear in the header and footer.
